articles.title: Historian Jon Meacham on political violence and the threat to American democracy - cbsnews.com
articles.description: The murder of Charlie Kirk last week follows a litany of violent acts against political targets. Historian Jon Meacham talks about the existential questions now facing America.
articles.content: For Jon Meacham, the Pulitzer Prize-winning historian, and author of "The Soul of America: The Battle for Our Better Angels," this past week has been disturbing – and all too familiar. Asked what is … [+3839 chars]
